item.title: WHOAMI?
item.description:
A passionate security researcher, Developer, and a Writer.

Hi !! I’m Mihin, a 23-year-old Computer Science undergraduate from Sri Lanka. I am passionate about security research and software development (specially system softwares on Linux/Windows), and also enjoy expressing my thoughts through writing. Currently,

I am working on my personal projects, which you can explore below.

  • [*] Simple IDS
  • [*] Scraper for my own use
  • [*] Simple game engine //

These days i’m cooking with Rust and hope to learn GO.

Github: mihinN

‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ø‡∑ä‡∂Ø‡∑í Global scope ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ( main ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂ã‡∂©‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö) , ‡∂ë‡∂∏ ‡∂±‡∑í‡∑É‡∑è globaly available ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∂±‡∑í‡∂ö‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂∏. ‡∂í‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂≠‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ‡∂∏‡∂∏ ‡∂ö‡∂Ω‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∑Ä‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö ‡∂î‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂ö‡∑ú‡∂∏ bundle ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂ú‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∂ß ‡∂¥‡∑É‡∑ä‡∑É‡∑ö ‡∂Ö‡∂Ω‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∂±‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑ä‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂´‡∂∫ ‡∑Ä‡∑î‡∂±‡∑ö data type ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ( ‡∂ë‡∂∫ User-define data type ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∑î‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è ), ‡∂â‡∑Ñ‡∂≠ ‡∂ã‡∂Ø‡∑è‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∂´‡∂∫‡∂ß ‡∂Ö‡∂±‡∑î‡∑Ä , ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑ö Data-type ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö struct school ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± ‡∂ë‡∂ö ü§† // Data-type ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂∏‡∑ú‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂Ø ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è ‡∂á‡∑Ñ‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑ú‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑í‡∂ö‡∂±‡∑ä school ‡∂±‡∑ô‡∑Ä‡∑ö , struct school . ü§†

‡∑Ñ‡∂ª‡∑í ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä Data-type ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂±‡∑í‡∂ª‡∑ä‡∂∏‡∑è‡∂´‡∂∫ ‡∂ö‡∂ª ‡∂ú‡∑ô‡∂± ‡∂Ö‡∑Ä‡∑É‡∑è‡∂±‡∂∫‡∑í. ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂∏‡∑ö‡∂ö‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂¥‡∑ä‚Äç‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∑ù‡∂¢‡∂±‡∂∫‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± , ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂∫ main ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß call ‡∂ö‡∂ª ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è , ‡∂ë‡∑Ñ‡∑ô‡∂∏‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∂Ö‡∑Ä‡∑É‡∑ä‡∂≠‡∑è‡∑Ä‡∂ß ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è struct ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä declare ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑è , ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂±‡∂∏‡∑ä initialize ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∑è ‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∑Ñ‡∂Ø‡∑î‡∂±‡∑ä‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä. struct ‡∂ë‡∂ö declare ‡∂ö‡∂ª‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂±‡∑ö ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∑Ñ‡∑ô‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑í ,

#include <stdio.h>
struct schools{
   char* name;
   char* district;
   int student_count;
};
int main(){
	struct schools f_school;
return 0;
}

‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∂Ü‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∂ß declare ‡∂ö‡∂ª ‡∂ú‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂≠ variable ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∂≠‡∑Ä‡∂∏ initialize ‡∂ö‡∑Ö‡∑è ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂± ‡∂≠‡∑ê‡∂±‡∂ß ‡∂á‡∑Ä‡∑í‡∂Ω‡∑ä‡∂Ω ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∑Ñ‡∑ê , ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∑Ñ‡∑ö‡∂≠‡∑î‡∑Ä ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í ‡∂ö‡∑í‡∑É‡∑í‡∂∏ Data ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ö‡∑ä ‡∂Ø‡∑ì‡∂Ω ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∂≠‡∑í ‡∂ë‡∂ö , ‡∂∏‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑ä‡∂± ‡∂∏‡∑ö ‡∂Ü‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∂ß data ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í create ‡∂ö‡∂Ω variable ‡∂ë‡∂ö‡∂ß ‡∂Ø‡∑ô‡∂∏‡∑î … ( variable ‡∂ë‡∂ö : f_school , data type ‡∂ë‡∂ö : struct schools )

#include <stdio.h>
struct schools{
   char* name;
   char* district;
   int student_count;
};

int main(){
	struct schools f_school;
	f_school.name = "St.thomas College";
	f_school.district = "Matara";
	f_school.student_count = 6500;

    printf("%s \n",f_school.name);
    printf("%s \n",f_school.district);
    printf("%d \n",f_school.student_count);

    return 0;
}

output ‡∂ë‡∂ö :

  • St.thomas College
  • Matara
  • 6500

‡∂í ‡∑Ä‡∂ú‡∑ö‡∂∏ ‡∂Ö‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß ‡∂¥‡∑î‡∑Ö‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂â‡∑Ñ‡∂≠ ‡∂Ö‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∂ß initialize ‡∂ö‡∂ª ‡∂ú‡∂≠‡∂¥‡∑î data , ‡∂¥‡∑Ñ‡∂≠ ‡∂á‡∂≠‡∑í ‡∂Ü‡∂ö‡∑è‡∂ª‡∂∫‡∂ß‡∂≠‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂±‡∑É‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂ª ‡∂ú‡∑ê‡∂±‡∑ì‡∂∏‡∂ß ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ö

#include <stdio.h>
struct schools{
   char* name;
   char* district;
   int student_count;
};

int main(){
	struct schools f_school = {
        .name = "St.thomas College",
        .district = "Matara",
        .student_count = 6500
    };

    printf("%s \n",f_school.name);
    printf("%s \n",f_school.district);
    printf("%d \n",f_school.student_count);

    return 0;
}

‡∂Ö‡∂Ø‡∂ß ‡∂ë‡∂¥‡∂∏‡∂´‡∂∫‡∑í , ‡∂¢‡∂∫‡∑Ä‡∑ö‡∑Ä‡∑è !ü§ç
